plot: Despite Gwen and Grandpa Max's warnings over toying with the Omnitrix, Ben messes around with it until - oops! - he breaks it and his aliens start coming out as fused hybrids.

While visiting to Florida's Gater-Fest, Ben damages the Omnitrix in trying to figure out if more aliens are inside, resulting in his subsequent alien transformations coming out as fused hybrids with diminished individual powers. Dr. Animo is also on hand, having tracked Ben down a trail of heroic deeds to seek revenge. Discovering the broken piece of the Omnitrix, the doctor realizes its potential and utilizes it to make a mutant ray gun that merges Earth and alien DNA, making Ben's life even more difficult as Earth's evolutionary history braces for a huge leap sideways.—statmanjeff
